title: Detektyvai:209
overview: Detectives: 209 - a half-hour, twelve-episode comedy series. The ordinary truth of life: everyone has problems - opens up a new business model for two heroes. They can solve people's problems, of course, while earning well from them. Who could refuse such an offer? Two professionals will take care of your troubles. It doesn't matter what troubles have attacked - testing the fidelity of a spouse, recovering a debt from a business partner, or pulling a friend out of a deep hole - Julius and Robke can handle anything. However, not all tasks are simple; they require dedication, skills, and quick thinking. These are character traits that detectives do not always rely on, but there are no unsolvable cases, their success rate is 100%. An unexpected, engaging, and always unpredictable detective series - a perfect blend of classic sitcom and modern genre experience: the viewer constantly stays on the edge of their seat, experiencing both laughter and tension.
